authors.author: Michael W. Smith Â© Milene Music

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Alleluia, Alleluia
For the Lord God Almighty reigns,
Alleluia, Alleluia
For the Lord God Almighty reigns,

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Alleluia; holy, holy
Are You, Lord God Almighty,
Worthy is the Lamb,
Worthy is the Lamb.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You are holy; holy
Are You, Lord God Almighty,
Worthy is the Lamb,
Worthy is the Lamb.
